product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys SmartStorage Double Wall Unit Storage Rack
long_description: Wasatch Powder Monkeys SmartStorage Double Wall Unit has your gear ready to roll the instant you are. Slide a bike rack, cargo box or ski rack onto this wall unit to store it out of way until needed.
short_description: Wasatch Powder Monkeys SmartStorage Double Wall Unit has your gear ready to roll the instant you are. Slide a bike rack, cargo box or ski rack onto this wall unit to store it out of way until needed.
